name: micran3
text: A comment left by micran3 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Belgand, regrepnsnefpoh, DHCJohn, regrepsnefpoh)

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by greatwhitehope7, jstegall, Jesler729, NYU, Moraiat, fancypants, DHCJohn, SoManyWhales, atticusonline, wellknell, cognitonaut, dropkickpikachu, heatbag, stoned_lightning, AmonRunsAmok, slalvation)

name: billyamericana
text: Dr. Andretti knows but two things: shit and cars.

name: spanntastic
text: Lyle is most likely twitching on the floor.

name: garlic_breath
text: Have you ever read an article about poop?

name: straw
text: Or perhaps a concise and nononsense brochure?

name: axhoola
text: Odd how "nononsense" in fact appears at first glance to be nonsense.

name: dusty
text: Without the space it's actually a brand of pantyhose. They probably do have a brochure. Hopefully it doesn't have to contain a sub-article about poop.

name: cdl146
text:
I actually remember the alt-text to this one.
"If it's green, then there is a problem."

name: philosophe
text:
"Why is it green?"
"Because of a problem?"

name: envika
text: AVATAR EMBODIMENT

name: belgand
text: I would normally agree with that statement, but it actually occurred to me once and scared me in a way I did not think possible. Ruminating over it, however, it was revealed to be most likely caused by eating a great quantity of guacamole earlier in the evening.

name: dumbeast
text: If it's green, soup tureen.

name: evolume
text: If it's black, send it back.

name: swatson
text: Ewwwwwwwwww

name: songbirdspectre
text:
How does this not have a full-on 5?
I do not understand.

name: cousinted
text: Anyone tried actually calling that number?

name: afterward
text: I have tried googling it; assuming it is in the 650 area code, it belongs to some guy in California. Which isn't surprising, but, now you know it is not actually a cat doctor.

name: spinynorman
text: If it's black then last night you had guinness or red wine.

name: sexualhomeboy
text: Guinness, in my case.

name: stopeatingmyeyes
text: if it's white, you have hepatitis C

name: erinye
text: Or have recently consumed barium sulfate.

name: i_love_kate
text: There is nothing like the thrill of pride upon rating a strip, when the Overall Rating value beneath it rises by a point one. You really feel like you're making a difference, you know?

name: atmus
text: The second person to rate a strip has you beat, especially if he vehemently disaggrees with the first rater.

name: rapid_roy
text:
I totally put this sign in our apartment bathroom.
But do you really want piss mellowing in the toilet for hours? I say you do not.

name: charchar
text: asparagus nightmare

name: overmedicated
text: Excellent name for a band.

name: rowboat
text: He overstates the problematic implication of a green deuce.

name: snowman
text: This is really weird, because years ago I wrote a really similar joke, except the last line of mine was, "If it's red, WHAT THE FUCK?!"

name: jollysaintpete
text: not that weird. call me crazy, but i'm willing to bet a lot of people other than you and Onstad have actually made that same joke.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Yes.  "If it's yellow, let it mellow; if it's brown, flush it down" is a pretty old line, and often a set up for a third line of your choosing.

name: spazdor
text: Did any women leave your place in an inexplicable huff?

name: hawaiian_robot
text: gpt am n innle on the pisss

name: aparrish
text: Yes, yes, poopy humor haha but what I want to know is WHOSE DEFLATED HAND is CRAWLING OUT OF THE SINK?

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
shhshhhshhhshhh...it's okay..
it's just a washcloth, baby.

name: genequagmire
text: I would like a copy of this strip to put over my shitter, delightfully branded "Church".

name: taurnufuin
text: Oh, come on, if it's black that just means you had to dodge last night's hangover with some Pepto Bismol.
